item.title: Entrance to footpath EBW49 from Green Street/Watermead, 16th January
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th January
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 16th January

item.title: Unsightly fly tipping, 16th January
item.description:
Coming from GEA in Brockhampton lane on the right hand side, before White Gates farm. Fly tipping. Looks like builders waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Pavement unusable, 16th January
item.description:
Outside No 2 Morlands Drive, the pavement has been blocked off and is unusable for over 6 months now with no update as to what is going on or when it will be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Morlands Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
